title: Finance Analyst Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Enactus
Interview Descriptions: Business case study themed. Working with a group of candidates to conduct a plan for one of their project in the upcoming 3 months. It concludes a final presentation at the end to show your work
Interview Questions: What challenges the plan might face?

title: Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Enactus (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: I had a face-to-face interview, the interview included questions about me, what would I do in certain scenarios, and to create a campaign for an event in 1 min. After that there was a section about why I would want to join them.
Interview Questions: Create a campaign for an event in 1 min

title: Senior Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Enactus (Alexandria, Alexandria Governorate) in Dec 2022
Interview Descriptions: Hr was so friendly and the interview was so easy They just want people have the ability to learn and work. They ask questions about you and your strengths points and weaknesses.
Interview Questions: What is business canva? What is the difference between entrepreneurial business and traditional business?

title: Customer Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Enactus (Birmingham, England)
Interview Descriptions: Swift and simple interview. Q ranged from why do you want to work Tell us more about yourselves Ever worked in a team What are your future aspirations and what do you want to gain from working here
Interview Questions: Tell us more about yourselves

title: Membro De Equipe Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Enactus
Interview Descriptions: Foram 3 etapas durante o processo, a primeira foi um forms com algumas perguntas sobre o time e os projetos, a segunda um case dividido em duas fases resolvido em grupo e a terceira uma entrevista individual
Interview Questions: Qual a diferença entre empreendedorismo social e assistencialismo?

title: Trainee Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Enactus
Interview Descriptions: Entrevista é realizada em três processos: Formulário social e de interesse,  avaliação em grupo presencial - com resolução de duas cases e apresentação para os demais membros presentes - e entrevista individual como fase final.
Interview Questions: Cite uma situação de liderança que você já se encontrou.

title: Alumni Engagement & Individual Giving Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Enactus in Jun 2022
Interview Descriptions: June 21 - Applied online. June 29 - Video screening interview, which was a typical screening experience.  Never received any follow up, however, have noticed the position is reposted every few weeks.  It has been  3 months now and the position is not actually posted on the organization website. Playing big organization mind games with applicants is not appealing.
Interview Questions: What is your experience working with program alumni?

title: Enactus Member Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Enactus (New Delhi)
Interview Descriptions: Interview feedback is the process by which interviewers take detailed notes about a candidate's answers and qualities to share with their hiring team. They take notes directly after the interview and refine them throughout the day as they have more time to reflect on the interview.
Interview Questions: What are the products you suggest that we help artisans create?

title: Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Enactus (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Mar 2022
Interview Descriptions: it was good, normal interview questions. nothing out of the box. no need to be nervous, and if you are they will comfort you. they will ask you normal questions and let you talk and show your skills
Interview Questions: talk about yourself and your experiences

title: Research Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Enactus (Mumbai) in Feb 2022
Interview Descriptions:
It was not to grilling, a good one. Just talk a lot about your drive for entrepreneurship. That's it! Good luck , All the best. 
How does research work? How organised are you etc.
Interview Questions: How Organised are you? Whats its importance in research

title: Program Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Enactus
Interview Descriptions: It is a multi step interview process including 3 rounds of interviews. A phone screening and then two additional interviews. The interviewers were very nice and conversational. It was a very traditional interview process.
Interview Questions: Were you part of Enactus as a student?

title: Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Enactus
Interview Descriptions: It was a very brief interview. They were very friendly and they asked me mostly about my interest and why I was applying for that position. I also talked about my skills and how they would fit the position I was applying for.
Interview Questions: What is your academical background and how would it benefit us.

title: Internal Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Enactus (Jakarta) in Jul 2021
Interview Descriptions: The interview process was very quick and simple. It consisted only one round which lasted around 30 minutes. They asked me 7 questions in total starting with questions about myself to questions about my past experiences and potential contributions.
Interview Questions:
Why do you think you’re the right fit for the position of Internal Associate?
Would you rather be a hunter or gatherer, and why?

title: Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Enactus (Toronto, ON) in Jul 2021
Interview Descriptions: It was pretty straight forward, they asked me about myself and about my past experiences that were relevant to the role. Also asked some situational and behavioural questions that were also quite simple and easy to answer!
Interview Questions: Describe a situation in which you had a disagreement with someone and how you handled it — pretty descriptive

title: R&D Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Enactus
Interview Descriptions: The interview was super easy. You usually go through 2 short interviews. They asked about very basic questions, like where you live, how you commute, and what your availability is. One question they asked was what you think you will add to this organization . You know right after if you are hired or not.
Interview Questions: what can you bring to the organization ?

title: Corporate Relations Executive Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Enactus
Interview Descriptions: Very informative and clear regarding the job role. A panel was present but didn't feel overwhelming, rather a positive environment. Able to give examples of past job role successes and they took interest in my future endevours and where i would like to go.
Interview Questions: What skills do you believe you have to offer?

title: Content Writer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Enactus
Interview Descriptions: The interview was well conducted and I was allowed to feel comfortable and relaxed as they treated all the applicants with empathy. The interview was a learning experience and an assurity  that am going to grow and feel good about giving as well
Interview Questions: What are your best strengths?

title: Trainee Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Enactus (Ribeirão Preto) in May 2021
Interview Descriptions: Bastante descontraída, mas com perguntas sérias como rotina, pontos fortes, fracos, qual sua dedicação para a empresa, quais suas pretensões caso seja aprovado, seus objetivos de carreira dentro e fora da empresa.
Interview Questions: Qual a sua disponibilidade de horários para reuniões?

title: Marketing Manager Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Enactus
Interview Descriptions: the interviewer was friendly, and the interview was informative and clear even it was a one way questions interview but the interviewer was really flexible overall it was a really a great experience
Interview Questions: describe yourself in 5 sentences?

title: Team Member Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Enactus
Interview Descriptions:
it was nice and fair; first I introduced myself then I got asked about my career goals and motives, and my personal objectives, they were friendly and nice.
Regarding the application, it was a bit long and had some unnecessary questions, but I think the interview was their measure.
Interview Questions: What was my career objectives?

title: IT Member Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Enactus (Asyut) in Nov 2020
Interview Descriptions: Assiut enactus where unprofessional and they were a waste of time, they have a random HR system and they are made to just show off certain aspects in front of other student clubs but in reality it is a corrupted community.
Interview Questions: What is a recycler view

title: Membro Voluntário Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 6 months. I interviewed at Enactus (São Paulo, São Paulo) in Oct 2020
Interview Descriptions: Foi muito tranquila a entrevista, foi uma conversa bem casual sobre os projetos que a Enactus vinha aplicando. Durou em torno de uma hora e foi online devido a pandemia.
Interview Questions: Você já fez trabalho voluntário?

title: Co-project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Enactus (Birmingham, England) in Sept 2020
Interview Descriptions: Video interview with behavioral questions and motivations with situations provided. Lasted for 2 hours. 2 interviewer, one former co-project manager, and one current project manager. quite detailed and not very formal
Interview Questions: What are your motivations to join Enactus?

title: Team Member Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Enactus
Interview Descriptions: Following a Group Discussion, there was a personal interaction. The interview covered entrepreneurship concepts and touched upon marketing, research and communication through a presentation of a hypothetical product. There were two interviewers.
Interview Questions: How to craft a marketing campaign?

title: Public Relations Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Enactus
Interview Descriptions: Awesome and straight forward interview process. Everything was well communicated and organized. It is a very friendly experience, probably the best interview process that I have gone through. Keep this up Enactus!
Interview Questions: My years of experience in higher learning communication roles.

title: Associate Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Enactus (Toronto, ON) in Jun 2020
Interview Descriptions: You were meant to apply through the job posting, which i found on LinkedIn, then they got back to me with an interview offer. Due to Covid - 19, my interview took place on Zoom. It was a to the point kind of interview but the questions were sort of hard.
Interview Questions: Why did you want to join Enactus?

title: Graphic Designer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Enactus (Banhā) in Nov 2019
Interview Descriptions: It was very easy, they asked me to introduce myself and my strengths, my weakness, it was in Arabic, why should we hire you, where do you see yourself in 5 years
Interview Questions:
Introduce yourself
Your strengths
Your weakness
Why should we hire you

title: IT Member Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Enactus (Asyut) in Nov 2019
Interview Descriptions: Good, could be better, i applied for android development commitiee member and i got the offer, i think its good if you are a junior but if you are experienced its usless and you will learn nothing
Interview Questions: what is a recycler view

title: Gerente De Gestão De Pessoas Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Enactus (Viçosa, Minas Gerais) in Nov 2019
Interview Descriptions: Foi maravilhoso A empresa tem um viés que combina com a minha personalidade e a forma como vejo o mundo. A entrevista me conduziu a um autoconhecimento. Foi incrível! Eu participaria novamente.
Interview Questions: Qual foi o momento mais importante da minha vida

title: Social Media Specialist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Enactus (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Oct 2019
Interview Descriptions: just hr and team leader interview where they both sit with you and ask you some personal questions and asks about your work with photoshop and illustrator and what did you do with them
Interview Questions: what is your strength and weakness points

title: Team Leader Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Enactus (Al Minyā, Giza Governorate) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions:
It forms of two persons, one is the HR and one is the technical committee. 
the interview starts with traditional questions like introducing yourself, then about soft skills by putting you in different situations to extract your skills. finally, technical questions according to the committee that is going to join.
Interview Questions:
introduce yourself
how is your reaction
your background in management

title: Team Member Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Enactus (Ahmadu, Borno) in Feb 2019
Interview Descriptions: It was a seamless process where questions around personal experience and ability to stay teachable is assessed. therefore, it is imperative to have track record of volunteering and participation in extra-curricular activities.
Interview Questions: What can you say are you strengths??

title: Volunteer Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Enactus (New Delhi) in Jul 2018
Interview Descriptions: There are three stages - two interview rounds: personal interview and panel interview. Interviews are taken by the members of the executive board, core panel and the advisory board.
Interview Questions:
1.Describe any of our projects?
2. Name all the UN Sustainable Development Goals.

title: Coordenador De Recursos Humanos (RH) Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Enactus (São Carlos, São Paulo)
Interview Descriptions: Processo muito bem estruturado, apesar de algumas falhas pontuais que poderiam ser evitadas. Equipe bem preparada e alinhada para aplicação do processo seletivo.
Interview Questions: O que te faria abandonar a empresa?

title: Coordenador De Programa Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Enactus
Interview Descriptions: Foi muito gostoso e, apesar de ser longo, me senti muito confortável em todas as etapas. As entrevistas, principalmente, foram muito no estilo conversa e senti que as perguntas eram realmente para mim, não apenas perguntas genéricas.
Interview Questions: As perguntas eram bem no estilo conversa, sobre minhas experiências.

title: Finance Team Member Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Enactus (Cairo, Cairo Governorate) in Dec 2017
Interview Descriptions:
it started  by signing up on enactus's site then i started the application process which is a long application with many situation and you should finish it in 30mins only 
then there was an 1 to 1 interview 
and that's it
Interview Questions: why do you want to join ENACTUS

title: Team Member Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at Enactus in Oct 2017
Interview Descriptions: the process almost took a week then i got an email to invite me to the interview .it was a friendly 20-minute interview. easy questions. they were mostly informational questions
Interview Questions: tell me about yourself

title: Student Leader Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Enactus (Bhubaneshwar) in Sept 2016
Interview Descriptions:
There were three rounds.1) Written Paper, 2) GD & 3) P.I.
The written paper was to test the applicant's IQ, aptitude skills, reasoning skills and language skills. 
The GD round was to test the applicant's speaking capability and listening skills.
Last round was the toughest,i.e., the Interview. There was a panel and it was thorough.
Interview Questions: Why did you want to join Enactus; What do you expect from Enactus KIIT University; How will you help us in bringing about a change in our society; What is your work experience?

title: Vice President Project Development Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1+ week. I interviewed at Enactus (Vancouver, BC) in Oct 2014
Interview Descriptions: Sent in resume and cover letter. Heard back from their HR a few days later. Had one interview with three people. The previous VP, the Project Director, and the President. The interview was alright, had a couple of questions that I disagreed with, but overall experience was decent.
Interview Questions: How many ping pong balls can you fit in an airplane?

title: Project Member Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Enactus (Shenzhen, Guangdong) in Oct 2011
Interview Descriptions: A interview first and a group project with a presentation.
Interview Questions: Whether the project is durable.
